snippet: The fiscal cliff deal could make tax reform more difficult.
abstract: Editorial warns that fiscal deal left much undone, and may also make tax reform more difficult; urges Pres Obama to fight for significant tax increases as deficit reduction talks go forward.
lead_paragraph: The fiscal cliff deal could make tax reform more difficult.

headline.seo: The Next Round of Tax Increases
headline.main: The Next Round of Tax Increases
headline.print_headline: The Next Round of Tax Increases
